content: शब(व)रः {@--1@} A mountaineer, barbarian, savage; राजन् गुंजाफलानां स्त्रज इति शवरा नैव हारं हरांति <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--3@} The hand. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated commentator and writer on Mīmāmsā --री {@--1@} A Śabara female. {@--2@} A female {%Kirāta%} who was an ardent devotee of Rāma.
